item.title: Late Chunking: Why Context-Aware Embeddings (sometimes) Beat Traditional Chunking
item.description: Traditional chunking methods for RAG pipelines often break context by chunking text before embedding. Late chunking offers a solution by embedding the entire document first and then chunking the token embeddings, preserving vital contextual information and improving retrieval accuracy.
